languages.text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on impact, and inflicts burning (6) for 3 rounds.
languages.original_text: Создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. При попадании наносит 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 20% и накладывает горение (6) на 3 раунда.

traits.locale_text: This grenade creates a burning area which lasts for 3 rounds which deals 10 Fire damage with 6 armour penetration and inflicts burning for 3 rounds to anyone who enters this area or start its round inside it.

This grenade creates a burning area which lasts for 3 rounds, dealing 10 fire damage and inflicting burning for 3 rounds to anyone who enters this area or starts their round inside it. This attack has 6 armour penetration.

This grenade creates a burning area which lasts for 3 rounds, dealing 10 fire damage and inflicting burning for 3 rounds to anyone who enters this area or starts their round inside it. This attack has 6 armour penetration.

languages.text: Diese Granate erzeugt einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennenden{/g} Bereich, der für 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} Bestand hat, 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} mit 20 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} beim Aufprall zufügt und 3 Runden lang Verbrennen (6) verursacht.
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on impact, and inflicts burning (6) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Diese Granate erzeugt einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennenden{/g} Bereich, der für 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} Bestand hat. Jeder, der seine Runde dort beginnt oder hineinläuft, erleidet 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und 3 Runden lang Verbrennen. Dieser Angriff hat 6 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.

languages.text: Cette grenade génère une zone ardente qui, pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, inflige 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} à l'impact, ainsi que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (6) pendant 3 rounds.
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on impact, and inflicts burning (6) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Cette grenade génère une zone {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardente{/g} qui, pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, inflige 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} ainsi que des dégâts de combustion à tous ceux qui y entrent ou y commencent leur round. La {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de cette attaque est de 6.

languages.text: 手雷会形成一片{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。手雷爆炸时造成10点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，此次攻击拥有20%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，同时施加燃烧（6）状态，持续三轮。
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on impact, and inflicts burning (6) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: 手雷会形成一片{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果有任何生物进入这片区域，或在这片区域内开始回合，则会受到10点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，同时陷入燃烧状态，持续三轮。此次攻击获得6点{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。

languages.text: Esta granada crea una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} que dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, inflige 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} con 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} e inflige quemadura (6) durante 3 asaltos.
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on impact, and inflicts burning (6) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Esta granada crea una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} que dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, inflige 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} e inflige quemadura durante 3 asaltos a cualquiera que entre en el área o empiece su turno en ella. Este ataque tiene 6 de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.

languages.text: このグレネードは、3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}消えない{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}エリアを作って、着弾時に20%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ10の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}災ダメージ{/g}を与え、3 ラウンドの間、炎上（6)を付与する。
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on impact, and inflicts burning (6) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: このグレネードは3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}持続する{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}エリアを生成する。このエリアに立ち入った相手、またはラウンド開始時にエリア内にいた相手に{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を10与え、3ラウンドの炎上を付与する。この攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}は6。

languages.text: Создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. При попадании наносит 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 20% и накладывает горение (6) на 3 раунда.
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a burning area which lasts for 3 rounds, dealing 10 fire damage and inflicting burning for 3 rounds to anyone who enters this area or starts their round inside it. This attack has 6 armour penetration.

traits.locale_text: Создает область горения на 3 раунда. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, получает 10 огненного урона. Пробитие брони составляет 6%.
Создает область горения на 3 раунда. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, получает 10 огненного урона. Пробитие брони составляет 6%.
